message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.CR, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper proposes a new definition of causation using structural equations, which is a common approach in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses how this definition can be used to give a definition of causal explanation, which falls under the category of computational explanation (cs.CE). Additionally, the paper discusses how their definition resolves difficulties in the traditional account of causation, which could be relevant to the field of cryptography (cs.CR) and social and information networks (cs.SI).
